channel.title: Comments on: PhpStorm/WebStorm Typescript Class Template
channel.description: Manage Your Code Snippets with codeBelt | Code Examples / Tutorials / Articles

item.title: By: Omar Crosby
item.dc:creator: Omar Crosby
item.description:
Thanks a bunch for this, I didn't even know WebStorm supported templates like that. You saved me lots of time!
BTW, I just ran into this site and really think you should keep doing what you are doing. You have great stuff in here, I will be recommending it to others.
Thanks again,
Omar.
item.content:encoded:
Thanks a bunch for this, I didn’t even know WebStorm supported templates like that. You saved me lots of time!

BTW, I just ran into this site and really think you should keep doing what you are doing. You have great stuff in here, I will be recommending it to others.

Thanks again,

Omar.
